name: wikipedia.rehash
description: A minimal typographic rehash of Wikipedia, designed for screen readability. Please see https://github.com/Krasjet/wikipedia.rehash for more information.
additional_info: Currently very alpha and only tested on English Wikipedia pages. There are three parts to the installation of this rehash. You may also need the accompanying JavaScript and Charter font for better experience. I highly recommend you read the GitHub repository https://github.com/Krasjet/wikipedia.rehash before install this userstyle.
